tool_description: This API return info about country's state/province with iso codes.
title: Get Country Info

api_list.name: Get CountryInfo
api_list.description: This endpoint accepts countryIsoCode as URLParam and returns an object containing array of states with IsoCodes.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://get-country-info.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/countries/{countryisocode}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "get-country-info.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: GetAllCountry
api_list.description: Get List of all countries with their isoCodes
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://get-country-info.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/countries/all"

    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "get-country-info.p.rapidapi.com"

print(response.json())

SH.name: St Helena Ascension & Tristan Da Cunha

GS.name: South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands

api_list.name: Get CountryByIsoCode
api_list.description: This Endpoint is V2 of get country Info. This endpoint accepts countryIsoCode as URLParam and returns an object containing array of states with IsoCodes and country's currency details.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://get-country-info.p.rapidapi.com/api/v2/countries/country/{countryisocode}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "get-country-info.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
